alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 12:25AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN RAPIDES... NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS...NORTHWESTERN EVANGELINE...SOUTHEASTERN BEAUREGARD...CENTRAL CALCASIEU...SOUTHEASTERN VERNON AND ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 115 AM CST... At 1225 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elizabeth to near Moss Bluff. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Westlake, Iowa, Kinder, Oberlin, Glenmora, Elizabeth, Fenton, Reeves, Dry Creek, Moss Bluff, Ragley, Mittie, Grant, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Allen Parish Airport, Leblanc, and Beaver. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 59 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon
